item.title: Moving Home
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

Encoding error.

Open the file in NOTEPAD (yes, notepad).

Hit file > Save As.

Then in the prompt that comes up, change the file type from .txt to ANY file.
Next to/under that (may be near the save button), there’s a line for "Encoding: " and displays a box with options.
Change that to “ANSI” and hit save.

Then try and compile.

Read full topic

item.title: Moving Home
item.dc:creator: @Fortitude Fortitude
item.description:
@Fortitude wrote:

On line 1 in your clicking buttons there is an illegal character. It is pointing at the character that is illegal and needs to be removed. So go to line 1 and remove what looks wrong “∩╗┐”

The compiler will literally tell you exactly what needs to be done. So take your time and just read what it says and use logic and it will all become very simple. Post if you have any other problems.

Read full topic

c.SaveGame();
c.getPA().startTeleport(3087, 3501, 0, type); // varrock[/sup]

c.getPA().startTeleport(3079, 3251, 0, type); // varrock[/sup]
